title: Gold again; Balance is restored!
body:
So I wasn't surprised when I finished last season silver, and was thrilled when I finally got gold in preseason. As I expected my 6 - 4 placements undid my progress and I got placed in Silver II. 

Been grinding games since, the last 7 of which have had at least 2 plats.
I was lucky enough to skip both promos from S2->s1 and them from s1 > g5.
And now I'm gold with 15 wins and 7 losses.

replies.body:
gonna lose last one and get silver 1-3 watch

5-4 atm

back to g5

> [{quoted}](name=Skyprus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=aWEvEmMW,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2015-01-24T06:57:15.414+0000)
>
> Nice!
> Did you go 5 -5 or 6 -4 ?

5-5

won 5 in a row

then lose 5 in a row xd
Better that way than the other
Will matchmaking ever find true balance - {{champion:84}}
Well done on getting your MMR back up.
If you finished last season as silver, why put AGAIN in the title?
got gold in preseason....still counts as getting gold.
